nodes.text: Sometime between the year 3681 BBY and 3640 BBY, the Sith Lord Fulminiss summoned a storm of Force energy that disintegrated an entire city of rebellious natives on the planet Jabiim, which was under the control of the reconstituted Sith Empire. The act gained Fulminiss great fame and respect among his comrades in the Empire, and it added to his reputation as a master of Sith sorcery and mass extermination.

The city's destruction was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Fulminiss within Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
